hiveArticle.title: Hanuman Temple at Agraha - Bangalore
hiveArticle.body:
The hanuman temple is located below Agraha flyover has a tall statue of Shree Haunaman with a height of 102' .It's highly recommended to visit this temple if you are in Bangalore . 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/n84f8svpnk.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/co3qvp9oxy.jpg)
